content: ferrero rocher tree bags these little bags each filled with one ferrero rocher are designed to hang on the christmas tree materials twilleys goldfingering or similar yarn 2 50 mm crochet hook ferrero rocher abbreviations english crochet terms chain - chain slip_stitch slip_stitch double_crochet double_crochet half_double_crochet half treble treble_crochet treble prev previous st stitch ea each space - space method note 2 chain at the beginning of each rounds does not count as a stitch round 1 make a circle with the yarn and into it work 2ch for height and 12 half_double_crochet slip_stitch to first half_double_crochet to join round 2 work 2ch for height and then 2htr into each half_double_crochet of prev round 24 sts round 3 work 2ch for height *over the next 2 sts work 1htr in first st and 2htr into next st repeat from * to end slip_stitch to first half_double_crochet to join 36 sts round 4 work 1dc into each st round 5 nb this round is worked from the back and makes the double_crochet round stand out as an edging to the base of the bag work 2ch for height work 1htr into ea st of double_crochet round but working through the double_crochet st from the back of the work and going down into the top of the prev half_double_crochet st this makes the previous double_crochet round stand out at the front of the work see illustration below nb the following illustrations are from a different project but using the same technique to achieve this work as follows put your hook through the top of the required stitch from the back and go down into the half_double_crochet of the row below keep the hook at the front of the work as you do this the hook tip will now be at the back of the work pull the yarn through and make the half_double_crochet as usual your bag base should now look like this round 6 to 10 work in half_double_crochet round 11 work 2ch for height then work *1tr in the first st miss next st 1ch 1tr in next st repeat from * to end but joining the chain to the first st with a slip_stitch round 12 making 2ch for height at the beginning of the round as before work 1htr into ea treble_crochet of prev row and 1htr into ea chain space slip_stitch to first st to join edging *1dc into first st 5ch miss next st repeat from * to end slip_stitch to join break off yarn and sew in the end finishing make 2 twisted cords use 1 5m yarn for each and thread through the top row of holes in opposite directions knot the ends of each cord together and cut to form a little tassel twisted cord take 1 5 m of yarn and double it put the doubled end around a small hook or doorknob hold the other two ends together and twist in one direction at least 25 twists keep hold of this
